hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd $CHECKMATE_HOME export TANGO_HOST='localhost:10202' export TANGO_DB_NAME=pytango_C3_cpp_runs DataBaseds 2 -ORBendPoint giop:tcp::10202& sleep 10 python checkmate/nose_plugin/plugin.py --nocapture --with-checkmate --application=pytango.checkmate.application.Application --sut=C3 --runs=100 --random checkmate/ sample_app/
